availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Valentine C. Kendall (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, farmer and boarding house operator. )

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, farmer and boarding house operator. Kentucky native. Married to Mary M. Egerton Kendall in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on November 28, 1838. Father of Adrian T. Kendall, Susan C. Kendall and Lucy H. Kendall. Farmer in Jefferson County in 1860. Boarding house keeper in Jefferson County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District No. 1, p. 861.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Shardines District, p. 407B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY Roll994027-994058, Louisville Deaths, p. 226.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film 000817877, p. 168.
